title: Hawaii Health Systems Corporation
context: CHAPTER 323F HAWAII HEALTH SYSTEMS CORPORATION Part I. Other Provisions 323F-31 Maintenance of services 323F-32 Acquisition of Kahuku hospital 323F-33 Hawaii Medical Center-East; affiliation; acquisition 323F-34 Tobacco and electronic smoking devices use prohibited Part IV.
